question: Hermann Scheer (Germany) received right Livelihood Award in 1999 for
option1: his indefatigable work for thepromotion of solar energy worldwide
option2: his long standing efforts to end the impunity of dictators
option3: showing that organic agriculture is a key to both environmental sustainability and food security
answer: his indefatigable work for thepromotion of solar energy worldwide
